casebody.data:
No. 12,

Original.

State of New Mexico v. State of Colorado. Motion for modification .of decree submitted March 2, 1925. March 9, 1925, Messrs. F. W. Clancy, O. A. Larrazolo and Jay Turley for complainant. Messrs. Wm. L. Boatright, Victor E. Keyes, Delph E. Carpenter, Oliver Dean and Chas. Roach, for defendant.

petition for modification of opinion in this cause denied.
